creator: Podalong, LLC.
descriptionHtml:
Listen to your favorite podcasts with Podalong, one of the best podcast players for Android! Discover new podcasts from various topics: news, sports, tech, crime, comedy, and more. You can also find some of your favorite podcasts: Serial, This American Life, The Joe Rogan Experience, Reply All, and many more. If you love sports, you can try out news and talk shows about the latest NBA and NFL Championships. Like politics? We have those podcasts too! Podalong is great to use for people who are looking for something new to listen to or just want to pass the time during their commute. Whether you like crime, news, music, or comedy podcasts, we'll have what you'll love.

So, you are on your way home from work and get stuck in the traffic? Can you think of something to do during your commute? Why not tune into a podcast to listen to? We have millions of episodes to listen to and it increases every day.

Why Podalong?
• Listen to any podcast and episode whenever and wherever you like
• User friendly and easy to use app
• Player playback speed and sleep timer options
• Download episodes to listen to offline
• Simple and Smart Playlists to keep episodes organized
• Browse by category or use our built-in search
• Get notifications when new episodes are added
• Discuss podcasts and episodes with other listeners
• Sync your progress through our app and the web

We are working hard to make sure we create the best podcast app on the market. We are very open to any feedback and criticism. Don’t hesitate to let us know what you think about Podalong through our website.
descriptionShort: Discover, stream, and discuss your favorite podcasts on Podalong today.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Basic Android Auto support
Complete audio rework for improved performance
Fixed episodes randomly stopping
You can now close the app with an episode running and it will continue running
In case of any issue, please contact us immediately.

If you love sports, you can try out news and talk shows about the latest NBA and NFL Championships. Like politics? We have those podcasts too! Podalong is great to use for people who are looking for something new to listen to or just want to pass the time during their commute. Whether you like crime, news, music, or comedy podcasts, we'll have what you'll love.

So, you are on your way home from work and get stuck in the traffic? Can you think of something to do during your commute? Why not tune into a podcast to listen to? We have millions of episodes to listen to and it increases every day.

Why Podalong?
• Listen to any podcast and episode whenever and wherever you like
• User friendly and easy to use app
• Player playback speed and sleep timer options
• Download episodes to listen to offline
• Simple and Smart Playlists to keep episodes organized
• Browse by category or use our built-in search
• Get notifications when new episodes are added
• Discuss podcasts and episodes with other listeners
• Sync your progress through our app and the web

We are working hard to make sure we create the best podcast app on the market. We are very open to any feedback and criticism. Don’t hesitate to let us know what you think about Podalong through our website.
descriptionShort: Discover, stream, and discuss your favorite podcasts on Podalong today.
